question: Which Union Minister represented India in the fourth edition of the virtual Ministerial on Climate Action (MoCA)?
explanation:
The fourth edition of the Ministerial on Climate Action (MoCA) was recently held through video conferencing. 
Indiaâ€™s Union Minister of Environment, Forest and Climate Change, Prakash Javadekar represented the country in the meeting. It was co-chaired by European Union, China and Canada to discuss on the implementation of the Paris Agreement under the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC).
